amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funding for the Diesel Emissions Reduction (DERA) program by $30 million and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce the State and Tribal Assistance Grants account by $30 million an applies the savings to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Blackburn amendment (A036) Failed by recorded vote: 114 - 314 (Roll no. 664).
